action.action-desc: Mr. Huizenga introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To prohibit the Secretary of the Treasury from using facial recognition technology to access any Internal Revenue Service online account.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Facial Authorization Cannot be Enforced Act or the FACE Act.

section.header: Prohibition on facial recognition for access to Internal Revenue Service accounts
section.text: The Secretary of the Treasury may not establish or maintain any verification process for access to an Internal Revenue Service online account using facial recognition technology.
